forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West northwest wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the warmth of the sun fosters an inviting, clear autumn day. The early observations reveal a landscape draped in sunlight, with the iconic Golden Gate Bridge standing resolutely against a backdrop of soft blue skies and wispy clouds. The air feels fresh, almost crisp, carrying the promise of a mild day ahead as the expected high glides comfortably towards 62 degrees. While the morning was tranquil, the west wind begins to stir, rustling through branches and whispering of change, with gusts hinting at the temperate nature of the Bay's microclimate.

There’s no sign of fog cloaking the hills; rather, it’s a splendid display of clarity that invites leisurely strolls. Embrace the serenity of the city streets, perhaps indulging in the simple joy of a coffee at your favorite café while people-watching. A light sweater would be ideal for the day, as temperatures may drop slightly in the afternoon, allowing you to appreciate the season without feeling chilled. As night descends, the clouds will take on a soft glow under a partly cloudy sky; the breeze will linger, keeping the air cool. The ambiance is perfect for an evening walk along the waterfront—perhaps with a loved one as the city lights twinkle like stars captured in a glass sea.
